name: invoice_line
summary: A detail table representing a single item within a customer invoice, linking to both the invoice and the specific track purchased.
purpose: This table exists to provide granular detail for each item included in an `invoice`. It records which `track` was purchased, at what `unit_price`, and in what `quantity`, enabling a complete breakdown of an invoice's contents and total value. This is crucial for sales reporting and inventory management related to tracks.
dependencies_thoughts: This table acts as a detail record for the `invoice` table, with each line item referencing a specific `track` from the `track` table. Its existence is dependent on valid `invoice` and `track` entries.

columns.description: The unique identifier for each individual line item within an invoice, serving as the primary key.
The identifier of the parent invoice to which this line item belongs. This is a foreign key referencing the 'invoice' table.
The identifier of the music track being purchased in this line item. This is a foreign key referencing the 'track' table.
The price of a single unit of the track at the time of purchase.
The number of units of the track purchased in this line item.
